misc_items.title: Double or Nothing

misc_items.title: Streak Freeze
misc_items.description: Streak Freeze allows your streak to remain in place for one full day of inactivity.
misc_items.name: streak_freeze

misc_items.title: Extra Moves
misc_items.description: Get extra moves to keep going.
misc_items.name: extra_moves

misc_items.title: Heart Refill
misc_items.description: Allows you to regain one heart lost during a lesson.
misc_items.name: heart_refill

misc_items.title: Double or Nothing
misc_items.description: Attempt to double your five lingot wager by maintaining a seven day streak.
misc_items.name: rupee_wager

misc_items.title: Zaps
misc_items.description: Use a Zap to skip one question during a lesson.
misc_items.name: zap
